Meetings & Events in Tropical Paradise
Serious Meetings, Serious Fun
The vibe, the South Florida location, and the Margaritaville Hollywood Beach Resort experience offers the perfect balance of business and pleasure. The coastal-luxe ambiance permeates throughout the spacious 15,000 square feet of interior meeting space along the 9th floor. This is where collaboration, motivation, and productivity thrive. The inspired enclave is insulated from distractions, providing an elevated focus to the business at hand. Robust attendance, a thirst for knowledge, clarity of mind, and attention to detail are part of the ROI with your successful meeting. When the serious business of the day is done, it’s time for some serious fun. Your license to chill awaits!
Start Planning
CLICK TO CALL
3-d
Tour
Corporate Events
Overlooking the Atlantic Ocean, the resort’s indoor and outdoor event spaces set the stage for collaboration, motivation, and productivity. The venues and services here are perfect for board meetings and corporate events, ensuring all the peace and productivity you need.
LEARN MORE
Special Events
Private dinners, cocktail parties, group getaways, and more — this beachfront paradise is the perfect place to host your special event
LEARN MORE
Catering
Whether you’re fueling your business meeting or hosting a lavish banquet, the resort’s customizable menus and packages can accommodate any scope and style you have in mind.
LEARN MORE
Team Building
Explore fun activities, friendly competitions, and guided programs designed to build communication and help your team members work together more effectively.
LEARN MORE
Awards & Accolades
Margaritaville Hollywood Beach Resort is proud to be recognized by the following prestigious publications and organizations for outstanding service and leadership.
LEARN MORE
Venue Floor Plans
Indoor, outdoor, intimate, or expansive — the resort’s flexible venues can perfectly accommodate whatever you have in mind for your event. Explore the spaces and find the perfect setting for your gathering.
CREATE FLOOR PLAN
VIEW VENUES

Corporate Retreats in Tropical Paradise
Productivity in Paradise
Board meetings, award ceremonies, training sessions, team building, exhibits, receptions, and every gathering in between are just better in paradise, where innovative meeting and event spaces are complemented by unique dining experiences and thoughtfully curated recreational opportunities.
Start Planning
3-d
Tour
MEETING SPACES IN PARADISE
Envision your event without boundaries or limitations, and you will understand why meetings at Margaritaville Hollywood Beach Resort are transformative. Customized to meet and exceed your wants and needs, with an unparalleled natural landscape that inspires long after the keynote speaker. Overlooking the Atlantic Ocean, the 9th floor at Margaritaville Hollywood Beach Resort is an enclave of inspired productivity, fueled by motivation and imagination. There is more than 30,000 square feet of flexible indoor and outdoor event space, including 15,000 square feet of interior space, inclusive of ballrooms, breakout rooms and spectacular pre-function areas with views that exceed all expectations.
Venue Floor Plans
PROFESSIONAL EVENT MANAGEMENT
The Margaritaville Hollywood Beach Resort team of event professionals are passionate about each event. We take the time needed to understand your meeting purpose and the unique aspects within your group, allowing us the latitude to support your goals and deliver an experience at the highest point above sea level. Our event teams thrive on partnership with you, from planning to execution. Logistics is our specialty, and that allows you to focus attention on other inspired priorities. Teamwork makes the dream work in paradise.
MEETING SPACES IN PARADISE

Team Building Adventures in Oceanfront Paradise
Beachside Bonding
Customized team-building experiences such as Beach Olympics, Resort Scavenger Hunt, or even a surfing contest on the FlowRider®, encourage collaboration and creates memories. Groups can also check out the sights by yacht charter or take a cruise by Water Taxi along the famed, “Venice of the Americas,” departing conveniently from 5 o’Clock Somewhere Bar & Grill.
Start Planning
3-d
Tour
Teamwork makes the dream work!
The following activities are hosted and available through our onsite staff.
Please reach out to your Conference Service Manager for more information.
Blender Bike (1-2 hours)
The Margaritaville Blender Bike team-building activity is fun, interactive, and promotes teamwork, communication, and healthy competition. So, get your team in a Margaritaville state of mind and shake things up with the Blender Bike team-building experience!
LEARN MORE
Margarita Mixology (1-2 hours)
Learn how to make the Perfect Margarita with our expert Mixologists. Your group will be split into teams. Each table will be set with ingredients to make a variety of margaritas. Each team must go to the “shopping” table and use those ingredients to make their own margarita. Depending on what the client wants, teams can either share the ingredients or provide them on a first-come-first-served basis. For groups that do the first-come-first-served option, there will be a trivia question to determine which team goes first.
The FlowRider Challenge (1-2 hours)
(1-2 hours)
Groups will compete in a series of individual challenges on the FlowRider® Double to determine the winner. In a competition similar to the game H-O-R-S-E, the participants will compete in the B-U-F-F-E-T-T challenge. The first rider sets the trick and the other players attempt to follow the same trick. The last player standing is declared the winner.
Group Fitness Classes (1 hour)
Schedule a private group class, or personal training, please inquire at the link below to learn more or call (954)-874-4430.
LEARN MORE
Blender Bike (1-2 hours)
The Margaritaville Blender Bike team-building activity is fun, interactive, and promotes teamwork, communication, and healthy competition. So, get your team in a Margaritaville state of mind and shake things up with the Blender Bike team-building experience!
LEARN MORE

Each team must go to the “shopping” table and use those ingredients to make their own margarita. Depending on what the client wants, teams can either share the ingredients or provide them on a first-come-first-served basis. For groups that do the first-come-first-served option, there will be a trivia question to determine which team goes first.

The last player standing is declared the winner.
Group Fitness Classes (1 hour)
Schedule a private group class, or personal training, please inquire at the link below to learn more or call (954)-874-4430.
LEARN MORE
MORE FUN UNDER THE SUN
The following activities can be hosted on site through our preferred Destination Management Company.
Please reach out to your Conference Service Manager for more information.
Beach Olympics (1-2 hours)
Groups will compete in a series of fun-filled and competitive challenges on the beach, facilitated by a host from the Recreation Team. Show off your skills with classic beach games such as relay and three-legged races, tug-of-war, horseshoes, hula hoop challenge, water balloon toss, titan pong, and more. The winning team will take home gold medals based on the grand total score tally at the end of all events.
Sandcastle Competition (1-2 hours)
Teams must stay within their designated spot and no sand may be added or removed. Only materials found on the beach may be used in the finished sculpture. Tools included to build your castle are: two large buckets, two small buckets, and three shovels. The Recreation Team will judge the finished masterpieces.
Scavenger Hunt (1-2 hours)
Groups will be split into teams and extra Parrot Points go to the group with the most original name. Your scavenger hunt can be customized to your liking, with teams given a list of items to complete for time. Some of the tasks may include snapping a super awesome selfie with a FlowGuard or posing in front of the giant flip flop with a flip flop.
Guided Eco Tour (1-2 hours)
The resort’s guides will escort the group through the Anne Kolb Nature Preserve and into West Lake. After taking in the beautiful scenery, the group will continue the journey to the mangrove trails. The guides will discuss the history of the area while pointing out the various wildlife and the symbiosis of the mangrove trails and its inhabitants.
LEARN MORE
Team Relay Races (1-2 hours)
(1-2 hours)
The group will paddle out from 5 o’Clock Somewhere Bar & Grill to the race area. Everyone will have about 30 minutes to paddle around as a group to get comfortable with their equipment. After everyone is warmed up, the race will begin. Teams of four to 10 people will compete to race around a buoy and back to the starting line, and racers must tag their next team member before starting their lap around the buoy.
Lost Shaker of Salt (2-3 hours)
This event is truly one-of-a-kind and can accommodate smaller parties. One of the resort team members will hide “salt shakers” throughout the resort that will lead your team to solve the mystery of the lost shaker of salt. Jimmy will leave a note explaining that “someone” or “something” has stolen the secret ingredient to his Perfect Margarita, but who’s to blame? That’s for you to figure out! Throughout the resort we will have clues leading to the missing salt shaker. Beginning and ending in the meeting space, you will have an opportunity for speeches and/or presentations for your group.

Celebrate in Style: Special Events in Paradise
HOST YOUR SPECIAL EVENT IN PARADISE
Margaritaville Hollywood Beach Resort is the perfect place to host special events for both business and pleasure. Here in paradise, flexible indoor and outdoor event spaces overlook the Atlantic Ocean, with coastal-luxe ambience, and a “no worries” tropical vibe.  From casual beachfront receptions, to ballroom black-tie dinners, and every event in between, our team of professionals and culinary experts will ensure your event is unique, successful, and memorable.
Book Your Special Event
Bar/Bat Mitzvahs
Birthdays and Anniversaries
Retirement Parties and Reunions
Galas and Award Ceremonies
Meetings and Trainings
Corporate Retreats
Holiday Parties
Fundraisers and Charity Events
Celebrations
Ready to start planning your Special Event? Tell us a bit more about what you have in mind, and we’ll show you how we can make it a reality.

Watersports Adventures: Kayak & Paddleboard Rentals
STANDUP PADDLEBOARDS, KAYAKS, NATURE TOURS AND MORE!
OPEN 7 DAYS/WEEK • 11AM – 6PM
Looking to experience a true South Florida adventure? Embark on a self-guided paddleboard or kayak tour along the renowned Intracoastal Waterway, leading to nature preserves and scenic mangrove covered trails. Located at the 5 o’Clock Somewhere Bar & Grill tiki hut, conveniently across the street from the resort. End your water adventure with island-inspired bites, a cold one in hand, and your toes in the sand.
